performExactSwap(address,address,address.notice: PERFORM AN SIMPLE SWAP WITHOUT ROUTER EXERCISE  The contract has an initial balance of 1 WETH.  The challenge is to swap an exact amount of WETH for 1337 USDC token using the `swap` function  from USDC/WETH pool.
